description: The crimson bottlebrush (Callistemon citrinus) is an incredible plant that adds vibrant color to any landscape. With beautiful, bright red flowers and dark, glossy foliage, this plant is sure to draw attention. It's a low-maintenance, hardy plant that thrives in many climates, from cold to tropical. The crimson bottlebrush is an evergreen shrub that produces an abundance of blooms year-round. Its nectar-rich flowers are a source of food for birds and bees, making it an excellent garden addition. This showy plant is perfect for brightening up a garden or yard with its unique color and texture. It's easy to grow and makes a great feature in any space.
